user_query: I want to analyze the financial statements of Apple Inc. (AAPL) and get current prices of cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the balance sheet of Apple Inc. (AAPL).
Retrieve the income statement of Apple Inc. (AAPL).
Retrieve the cash flow statement of Apple Inc. (AAPL).
Get the current price of Bitcoin.
Get the current price of Ethereum.
